name: Interval
semantic_context: Triggers the workflow in a given interval
natural_language_description: 这是 Interval 节点。主要用于: Triggers the workflow in a given interval

notice.displayName:
This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you publish it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'execute workflow'
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description:
参数名: This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you publish it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'execute workflow'

interval.name: interval
interval.natural_language_description: 参数名: Interval | 作用: Interval value | 默认值: 1

unit.name: unit
unit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Unit | 作用: Unit of the interval value | 默认值: seconds
